== Kandanassery (CT) (627784) ==

Kandanassery (CT) is a town in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 8.42 sq. km. and harbouring 3522 households with total population of 14645 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 25 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 300 km. Male population is 6727 and female population is 7918. Scheduled Caste population is 1025 and Scheduled Tribes population is 6. Census Location Code of the town is 627784<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 25 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 100 km. Railway station is at Guruvayoor at a distance of 8 km.
